featured.text: On Christmas Eve, 1992, Anthony had a heart transplant from a 21-year-old donor.
The Fourth of July means beer and New Year's Eve is an entire night dedicated to the proposition that everyone must get 25 .

definition.zh_def: 前夕；特定事件或節日的前一天
definition.en_def: The evening or day before a particular event, especially a holiday.
definition.example: We always have a family dinner on Christmas Eve.
